name: Emotional well being assessed
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward

concept.display: Are you basically satisfied with your life [GDS]
Have you dropped many of your activities and interests [GDS]
Do you feel that your life is empty [GDS]
Do you often get bored [GDS]
Are you hopeful about the future [GDS]
Are you bothered by thoughts you cannot get out of your head [GDS]
Are you in good spirits most of the time [GDS]
Are you afraid that something bad is going to happen to you [GDS]
Do you feel happy most of the time [GDS]
Do you often feel helpless [GDS]
Do you often get restless and fidgety [GDS]
Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things [GDS]
Do you frequently worry about the future [GDS]
Do you feel you have more problems with memory than most [GDS]
Do you think it is wonderful to be alive now [GDS]
Do you often feel downhearted and blue [GDS]
Do you feel pretty worthless the way you are now [GDS]
Do you worry a lot about the past [GDS]
Do you find life very exciting [GDS]
Is it hard for you to get started on new projects [GDS]
Do you feel full of energy [GDS]
Do you feel that your situation is hopeless [GDS]
Do you think that most people are better off than you are [GDS]
Do you frequently get upset over little things [GDS]
Do you frequently feel like crying [GDS]
Do you have trouble concentrating [GDS]
Do you enjoy getting up in the morning [GDS]
Do you prefer to avoid social gatherings [GDS]
Is it easy for you to make decisions [GDS]
Is your mind as clear as it used to be [GDS]
